name: Generic Platformer (ItzElectrix)
description: This was a game made for the Jumpstart Game Jam, which is run by Becker College. We had to make a functional video game in 24 hours. This is one of those submissions. With the big help of FireMario211, we made this game. It's basically a very simple 2D platformer with some pretty cool features. However, don't get too cocky, because things aren't always as they seem. Good luck...
